events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund for the incorrect product sent to me.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to an incorrect item sent in the customer’s order.
Support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer’s order issue.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. I’m here to help you process your refund as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and proceed with the refund?
Here is my order number 12345 and attached is a photo showing the wrong item that I received instead of the jacket I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide a prepaid shipping label to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the refund and return label solution and look forward to resolving this smoothly.
We have processed your refund and emailed you the prepaid label. Please send the incorrect item back at your convenience.
Just checking in to ensure the refund was received and the return shipment went smoothly. Please let us know if any further assistance is needed.
Since your refund was confirmed and no additional concerns were raised, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience.
